label: Chore
description: Maintenance tasks, updating dependencies, or other routine work that doesn't modify core functionality

label: Docs
description: Adding, updating, or fixing documentation such as README files, code comments, or user guides

label: Feat
description: Introducing new features or functionality to the application

label: Fix or bug
description: Fixing bugs, errors, or unexpected behavior in the codebase

label: Related to infrastructure
description: Changes to CI/CD pipelines, deployment configurations, server setup, or development environment

label: Package dependencies or compiled files
description: Managing project dependencies, updating package.json, or handling compiled/built files

label: Improve performance
description: Optimizing code for better performance, speed improvements, or resource usage reduction

label: Refactor code
description: Restructuring existing code without changing its external behavior to improve readability or maintainability

label: Remove code or files
description: Deleting obsolete code, unused files, or deprecated functionality from the project

label: Style
description: Changes that only affect the appearance of the code such as formatting, whitespace, or code style fixes
